content: until end of round continue as such until you reach the desired length for your size end after round 6 or 12 of the chart if possible standard measurements from the heel to the beginning of the toe sizes 36/37 38/39 40/41 42/43 length in cm 18 5 20 21 22 length in inch 7 3 7 9 8 3 8 7 toe round 1 *k1 k2tog k 22 24 26 ssk k1* repeat a second time round 2 k all stitches round 3 *k1 k2tog k 20 22 24 ssk k1* repeat a second time round 4 k all stitches round 5 *k1 k2tog k 18 20 22 ssk k1* repeat a second time round 6 k all stitches round 7 *k1 k2tog k 16 18 20 ssk k1* repeat a second time round 8 k all stitches round 9 *k1 k2tog k 14 16 18 ssk k1* repeat a second time round 10 k all stitches round 11 *k1 k2tog k 12 14 16 ssk k1* repeat a second time round 12 k all stitches round 13 *k1 k2tog k 10 12 14 ssk k1* repeat a second time round 14 k all stitches 4 round 15 *k1 k2tog k 8 10 12 ssk k1* repeat a second time round 16 k all stitches continue to the round tip section only sizes m and l round 17 *k1 k2tog k 8 10 ssk k1* repeat a second time round 18 k all stitches continue to the round tip section only size l round 19 *k1 k2tog k 8 ssk k1* repeat a second time round 20 k all stitches round tip all sizes round 1 *k1 k2tog k 6 ssk k1* repeat a second time round 2 *k1 k2tog k 4 ssk k1* repeat a second time round 3 *k1 k2tog k 2 ssk k1* repeat a second time graft remaining stitches together weave in ends and block 5 one-page cheat-sheet cuff round 2 special instructions co 56 64 72 st in the round flpk - bring the needle underneath all stitches counterclockwise slip the knit stitch purlwise round 1 *k1 p1* repeat until the end of round to the right-hand needle bring the needle back round 2 *flpk k1 p1* repeat until the end of clockwise and return slipped stitch to the left- round see special instructions to the right  hand needle round 3 *k1 p1* repeat until the end of round round 4 p all sts video tutorial here round 5 k all sts https //youtu be/f6qzxkyel40 round 6 *p1 k1* repeat until the end of round repeat round 6 an additional 9 times for a total of 10 rnds or until you reach your desired length for the cuff knit 2 rounds of stockinette before starting chart chart 6
